full_text: Good morning everyone, let's get started. Hello! Hello! Today we're covering the Client Kickoff. On the business side, We need to prepare the presentation slides. We need someone to review the budget proposal. I'll handle that by month end. Great, thanks for taking that on. Next item is business. Barbara and Peter, could you both work together to schedule a call with the client? Target completion is by Friday. Yes, we can handle that. Sounds good to me. On the business side, Barbara and Alex, could you both work together to prepare the quarterly report? Target completion is 15th of next month. Yes, we can handle that. Sounds good to me. On the business side, Tim, I'd like you to document the meeting notes. Please have this ready by April 10th. No problem. Is there anything blocking anyone from starting? No blockers. We're good to go. Great, thanks all. Let's keep each other posted on progress. Thanks! Bye all!
